unnormalised: My kid just got 65% in his stats test, and the teacher, Mrs. Sharma, said the class average was only 55.2. I'm wondering if he needs extra coaching to understand concepts like permutations and combinations better, or if it was just a tough paper.
normalised: My kid just got sixty five percent in his stats test, and the teacher, Missus Sharma, said the class average was only fifty five point two. I'm wondering if he needs extra coaching to understand concepts like permutations and combinations better, or if it was just a tough paper.
